content:
-by David Farragut pogs
-confeds put 2 chains across mouth of MS River to try prevent attack
-Farragut able to navigate through those and force Confed general there to evacuate and leave
     -gains control of NO, gave union control of NO

significance:
-extreme "body blow" to Confeds - fulfils part of Anaconda Plan and starts cutting of Confeds
     -cornering them in the SW and cutting off supplies on MS, key river for getting supplies)
     -dividing them too, cut off western confed states
